exhaustionMode.name: When Is Exhaustion Applied?
exhaustionMode.hint: Controls when exhaustion is applied. After combat will save all exhaustion until the end, all others will apply immediately

exhaustOnFirstDeathFail.name: Trigger on First Death Save Failure
exhaustOnFirstDeathFail.hint: Shifts the trigger from getting back up to failing the first death save.

enableConSave.name: Require a CON Save to Avoid Exhaustion
enableConSave.hint: Players roll a Constitution save when exhaustion would be applied. DC is set below.

baseSaveDC.name: Base Save DC
baseSaveDC.hint: Base DC for the CON save. When using After Combat Check Mode, this increases by 1 for each time the character went down (e.g. 3 downs = DC 13 at base 10).

afterCombatCheckMode.name: After Combat: Exhaustion Mode
afterCombatCheckMode.hint: When using 'After Combat'. Applies exhaustions either without a save (all stacked exhaustions), or with a save (increasing the DC by 1 for each down in combat) either single or stacked exhaustion

exhaustionOverrideSwap.name: Swap Exhaustion Ruleset [Experimental]
exhaustionOverrideSwap.hint: Flips exhaustion to the opposite ruleset. 2014 rules → applies 2024 mechanics. 2024 rules → applies 2014 mechanics. Requires a reload.
